_header: Father and Son and Holy Ghost o God in Trinity
Subjects: Trinity, prayers to; prayers, to Trinity
_description: The Knight of Christ, a prayer — seventy-six lines in irregular stanzas

Bod416.First Lines:
Fadur & sone & holi gost o god in triniteTo þe y make
                    my mone þouȝ y unworþi be…
Bod416.Last Lines:
…þat woldest of amaide springeSo be it pur seinte
                    charite
Bod416.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1924. 2nd ed., rev.: G. V. Smithers, Oxford,
            1952: 223-5.
